game.miscDetails: From manual: JUMP KICK: Joystick in the direction. Push jump then kick. ELBOW: Joystick in the direction. Push jump and punch buttons together. BACK KICK: Joystick in the direction. Push jump and kick buttons together. HEAD BUTT: Joystick in the direction. (TWICE) BODY THROW: Joystick in the direction. Push jump button after catching enemy. BREAK ENEMY'S HOLD: Push jump button only.
